channel.title: Im noob, how do i change IP of my Client?
channel.description: I got a client, but I Don't know how to change the IP of the client. so, nobody can join my server bacause they all log in on 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 . help please

item.title: Im noob, how do i change IP of my Client?
item.dc:creator: @hamza hamza
item.description:
@hamza wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:6, topic:250203”][quote author=hamza link=topic=329929.msg2578325#msg2578325 date=1229112292]
Search for ’ setserver’ and change that ip to yours then
go to EGUI.java
and u will c there “”,"",""
fill in ur ip in to the "s
like this “nlenven.no-ip.biz”,“nlenven.no-ip.biz”,“nlenven.no-ip.biz”
As information this isnt a real ip… so i aint advertising.
[/quote]
The class EGUI has nothing to do with IP.[/quote]

Well it works for me…

Read full topic
item.source: Im noob, how do i change IP of my Client?

item.title: Im noob, how do i change IP of my Client?

@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“hamza, post:4, topic:250203”]Search for ’ setserver’ and change that ip to yours then
go to EGUI.java
and u will c there “”,"",""
fill in ur ip in to the "s
like this “nlenven.no-ip.biz”,“nlenven.no-ip.biz”,“nlenven.no-ip.biz”
As information this isnt a real ip… so i aint advertising.[/quote]
The class EGUI has nothing to do with IP.

item.title: Im noob, how do i change IP of my Client?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Search ‘127.0.0.1’ or ‘0.0.0.0’ in client, and change it to your IP.

Read full topic
item.source: Im noob, how do i change IP of my Client?

item.title: Im noob, how do i change IP of my Client?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Go into Client.java i think it was last, Then search for the current IP* in use,
And change it to your IP*.

Read full topic
